name: Odd Jobs
description:
Welcome to oddjobs.com, where neighbors need your help! Sign-up, and start helping today. 

As we say, 

There's no job too odd!

Use your special skill to help those in need!

Movement Controls:

  • Click Move: Click to have your hand move towards the cursor
  • Auto Move: Use A | D or Left Arrow | Right Arrow to steer your hand
